div.style: display: inline-block; max-width: 280px; margin: 10px auto; padding: 15px; border:1px solid; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 0 1px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); line-height: 1.2; background-color: #ffffff; color: #000000; border-color: #dddddd;

img.style: width: 100%; height: 180px; margin-bottom: 20px; border-radius: 5px; object-fit: cover;

div.style: font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; font-size: 14px; color: grey; margin-bottom: 5px;

div.div:
